title: Create college inquiry chatbot with comprehensive Q&A system

requirements.text: Create a chat interface component with message history display, user input field, and send button that supports conversational interactions
acceptanceCriteria: Chat interface displays conversation history in a scrollable view
User can type questions and submit them via button or Enter key
Messages are clearly distinguished between user and chatbot responses
Interface is responsive and works on mobile and desktop devices

requirements.text: Implement backend data structure storing comprehensive college information including admissions requirements, available courses and programs, campus facilities and life, application deadlines, tuition fees, scholarship opportunities, contact information, and frequently asked questions
acceptanceCriteria: Data structure covers all major college inquiry categories
Information is organized in a queryable format
Backend can efficiently retrieve relevant information based on question topics

requirements.text: Build intelligent question-answer matching system that analyzes user questions, identifies relevant topics and keywords, and returns appropriate answers from the college information database
acceptanceCriteria: System correctly identifies question topics (e.g., admissions, courses, campus life)
Matching algorithm handles variations in phrasing and common synonyms
System provides relevant answers even for partially matching questions
Fallback responses are provided when no exact match is found

requirements.text: Connect frontend chat interface to backend query system so user questions are processed and appropriate college information responses are displayed in the conversation
acceptanceCriteria: User questions submitted through the chat interface are sent to the backend
Backend responses are displayed in the chat conversation flow
Response time is reasonable (under 2 seconds for most queries)
Error states are handled gracefully with user-friendly messages

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, academic styling using earth tones (greens, browns, creams) combined with modern typography and clean layouts that convey trust and professionalism suitable for an educational institution
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses warm, academic tones consistently throughout the interface
Typography choices enhance readability and convey educational professionalism
Layout is clean and organized with appropriate spacing and visual hierarchy
Overall design creates a welcoming and trustworthy impression

constraints: Backend must use Motoko single-actor architecture
Frontend must use React with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
No external LLM integrations or third-party AI services
All question-answer matching must be implemented using local logic
nonGoals: Integration with actual college databases or external APIs

required: College campus building illustration in warm academic style for hero section (campus-hero.dim_1200x400.png)
Chat bot avatar icon with friendly academic character (chatbot-avatar.dim_80x80.png)
